metadata.title: CVE-2023-46343 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel before 6.5.9, there is a NULL pointer dereference insend_acknowledge in net/nfc/nci/spi.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46343` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-lowlatency - 5.4.0-171.189
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-100-generic - 5.15.0-100.110~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-100-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-100.110~20.04.1
